The HS-Omega-3 Index prime parameter demonstrate bioavailability long-term . Study hypothesis increase intake EPA+DHA increase HS-Omega-3 Index . Study aim investigate supplement various sausage omega-3 fatty acid influence HS-Omega-3 Index healthy volunteer , compare unsupplemented matching sausage . Safety palatability sausage also assess .
